game-info.time_rules: Time attack. The faster you finish, the better.
game-info.timer_rules: Timed game. When time runs out, the game ends.
game-info.mistakes_rules: The number of mistakes must not exceed 3.

digit.instruction: Clear the board by selecting pairs of cells that add up to the number you chose.

shulte.instruction: Tap the cells in order from 1 to 16 or 25, depending on the selected board size.

queens.instruction: Place the queens on the board so that there is exactly one queen in each row, column, and surrounding area.
queens.tutorial: Board size 4 is a tutorial level. It is recommended to play it only a few times.

rules.1: Fill the board so that each row and column has 3 moons and 3 suns.
rules.2: Do not allow more than two identical symbols in a row.
